## Permission Matrix

| Permission | Administrator | Manager | Compliance Officer | Operations Staff | Customer |
|-----------|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|
| Create Onboarding Request | X | X | | X | |
| View Onboarding Status | X | X | X | X | X |
| Approve Onboarding | X | X | X | | |
| Manage Tasks | X | X | | X | |
| View Compliance Results | X | X | X | | |
| Override Compliance Decision | X | | X | | |
| Manage Products | X | X | | | |
| Configure Alerts | X | | | | |
| Manage Templates | X | X | | | |
| Manage Reference Data | X | | | | |
| View Reports | X | X | X | X | |
| Manage Users/Groups | X | | | | |
| Sign Documents | | | | | X |
| Upload Documents | X | X | | X | X |

## Pega Access Group Recommendations

| Pega Access Group | Portal | Primary Roles | Notes |
|------------------|--------|---------------|-------|
| FS:Administrators | Manager Portal | Admin, ConfigManager | Full system access |
| FS:Managers | Manager Portal | Manager, Reviewer | Team management, approvals |
| FS:ComplianceOfficers | User Portal | ComplianceReviewer | KYC/AML review, sanctions clearance |
| FS:Users | User Portal | CaseWorker | Day-to-day onboarding operations |
| FS:ExternalUsers | External Portal | ExternalParticipant | Customer-facing interactions |
